mapper.select: SELECT n.id AS nodeId, n.name AS nodeName, t.id, t.system_os, t.system_up_time, t.cpu_version, t.cpu_counts, t.cpu_percent, t.used_mem, t.total_mem, t.available_mem, t.mem_percent, t.used_swap, t.total_swap, t.free_swap, t.swap_percent, t.total_disk, t.free_disk, t.used_disk, t.net_send_bytes, t.net_recv_bytes, t.net_send_bytes_per_second, t.net_recv_bytes_per_second, t.gmt_create, t.proxy_status, t.proxy_reqs, t.proxy_service_time FROM (SELECT node_id, MAX(gmt_create) AS gmt_create FROM sp_node_agent GROUP BY node_id) a LEFT JOIN sp_node_agent t ON t.node_id = a.node_id AND t.gmt_create = a.gmt_create AND t.gmt_create > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 second) RIGHT JOIN sp_node n ON n.id = t.node_id WHERE n.is_deleted = 0
